directives.description: len([ch for ch in str(x) if ch.isalpha() and ch.isupper()]) / max(len([ch for ch in str(x) if ch.isalpha()]), 1) >= 0.8
directives.code:
def check(x):
    return len([ch for ch in str(x) if ch.isalpha() and ch.isupper()]) / max(len([ch for ch in str(x) if ch.isalpha()]), 1) >= 0.8
